actions.name: Use the obtained source code without modification
actions.description: Use the fetched code as it is.

actions.name: Use the retrieved binaries
actions.description: Use the fetched binary as it is.

actions.name: Use binaries generated from modified source code

permissions._str:
Actions:
- Use the obtained source code without modification (Use the fetched code as it is.)
- Using Modified Source Code
- Use the retrieved binaries (Use the fetched binary as it is.)
- Use binaries generated from modified source code

actions.name: Distribute the obtained source code without modification
actions.description: Redistribute the code as it was obtained

permissions._str:
Actions:
- Distribute the obtained source code without modification (Redistribute the code as it was obtained)

actions.description: Redistribute the fetched binaries as they are

permissions.description: "If you use the name "Zope Corporation (tm)". get permission from Zope Corporation.

permissions._str:
Actions:
- Modify the obtained source code.

Conditions:

permissions._str:
Actions:
- Distribution of Modified Source Code

Conditions:
OlConditionTreeAnd [OlConditionTreeLeaf (OlCondition {_condition_schemaVersion = "0.1", _condition_uri = "http://open-license.hitachi.com/conditions/1", _condition_baseUri = "http://open-license.hitachi.com/", _condition_id = "conditions/1", _condition_conditionType = OBLIGATION, _condition_name = Include a copyright notice, list of terms and conditions, and disclaimer included in the license, _condition_description = }),OlConditionTreeLeaf (OlCondition {_condition_schemaVersion = "0.1", _condition_uri = "http://open-license.hitachi.com/conditions/40", _condition_baseUri = "http://open-license.hitachi.com/", _condition_id = "conditions/40", _condition_conditionType = OBLIGATION, _condition_name = Indicate your changes and the date of your changes in the file where you made them., _condition_description = })]

Indicate your changes and the date of your changes in the file where you made them.
